detectCmp.exists: body > div[id][lang] > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > a:nth-child(2)

detectPopup.visible: body > div[id][lang] > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > a:nth-child(2)

optOut.waitForThenClick: body > div[id][lang] > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > a:nth-child(2)
